short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps recruiter with LinkedIn Sourcing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hate managing LinkedIn profiles for your role search? Check this out, you can save profiles you are interested in, or have selected or even you have offered them a job. You can track everything on this extension.

Things you can do:
- Add Tags (Status, skills, notes, etc.) to a profile
- Track view information and analytics in your dashboard
